title: Fragment, ca. 1700
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: chain stitch embroidery on twill weave
description: Mughal-style embroidery for the export market. Fragment with part of a central motif of interlaced shaded bands, floral motifs, large elaborate symmetrical leaf volutes with two large sceptre-like forms angled towards the center. Small pears with delicate leaves on stems fill sides of field out to guard borders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, ca. 1700. Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: chain stitch embroidery on twill weave. 1951-59-1-a.
